entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Elliot Lake
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Fog patches developing after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 3 overnight. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Clearing. High minus 6. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 14. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023
